item.title: A Journey to the Heart of Western Art
item.author: Blaise Verhasselt,
item.description: In collaboration with the Royal Museum of Fine Arts of Antwerp, the Royal Academy presents the first exhibition in the UK exploring Rubens’ influence on subsequent art history. This extremely rich display demonstrates the lasting impact Peter Paul Rubens (1577-1640) had on successful painters during …

item.title: Angolan Civil War makes powerful subject matter
item.author: Blaise Verhasselt,
item.description: What: The Dead Wait Where: The Park Theatre, Finsbury Park, N4 When: Until 1st Dec 2013 Price: £12 students, £18 adults South Africa, 1989, and Josh Gilmore is poised to become the first white man to break the 10-second barrier for the 100m, and be made a hero by the racist regime. He is conscripted …
